name: Bounce It AR
description:
Bounce It is a small game, where you have to bounce a virtual ball between the digital and physical world, inspired by trickshotting.

You have a set amount of cubes to place, and need to bounce the ball between the (dissapearing) cubes and the real world. If you bounce twice in a row on the real world it is game over.

This is NOT in active development and made in +- 12 hours in 1 weekend by 1 person (student). Don't expect a full game!
